Question: What should I do first with shredded Cheddar cheese? 
 Context: Ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 onion, chopped, 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, 12 small chile peppers, diced  (optional), 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 1 bunch green onions, chopped, 1/2 pint heavy cream, 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, 3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips. 1) Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. 2) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 3) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 4) Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown. 5) Stir in diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, stewed tomatoes, chile peppers, soup and broth. 6) Bring mixture to a boil. 7) Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. 8) Remove chicken from skillet, and shred when cool enough to handle. 9) Meanwhile, allow skillet mixture to simmer and reduce to about 2 1/4 cups. 10) In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture). 11) Mix together with half the chopped green onions. 12) Pour remaining 2 cups of skillet mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. 13) In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil. 14) Dip tortillas in the warm cream to soften and coat. 15) Spoon about 1/3 cup chicken mixture onto each tortilla. 16) Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas. 17) Place rolled tortillas in baking dish, seam side down, and drizzle with enchilada sauce. 18) Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese. 19) Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.
conv_answer: Cut the chicken breast into strips of 1 inch.
target_answer: 0) Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips.

Directions: 0) Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips. 1) Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. 2) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 3) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 4) Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown. 5) Stir in diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, stewed tomatoes, chile peppers, soup and broth. 6) Bring mixture to a boil. 7) Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. 8) Remove chicken from skillet, and shred when cool enough to handle. 9) Meanwhile, allow skillet mixture to simmer and reduce to about 2 1/4 cups. 10) In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture). 11) Mix together with half the chopped green onions. 12) Pour remaining 2 cups of skillet mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. 13) In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil. 14) Dip tortillas in the warm cream to soften and coat. 15) Spoon about 1/3 cup chicken mixture onto each tortilla. 16) Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas. 17) Place rolled tortillas in baking dish, seam side down, and drizzle with enchilada sauce. 18) Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese. 19) Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.
conv_answer: Chop 1 bunch of green onions and mix it together with the chicken.

Question: Tell me what to do when I'm all set to make the gingerbread men? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1/2 cup margarine, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup molasses, 1 egg yolk, 2 cups sifted all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ginger, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. 1) Stir in molasses and egg yolk. 2) Combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg; blend into the molasses mixture until smooth. 3) Cover, and chill for at least one hour. 4) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 5) On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. 6) Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. 7) Place cookies 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. 8) Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. 9) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. 10) Frost or decorate when cool.
conv_answer: First, take a large bowl.

Question: Okay good, what's next after cream cheese? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Now let's start with the recipe. First already preheat the oven to 175 degrees Celsius.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt and then set aside.
target_answer: 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Good. No, not yet.

Question: Can we start with the Cheddar cheese recipe? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed, 3 eggs, 1/2 teaspoon onion salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided, 3/4 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs, 16 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, salt and pepper to taste, 5 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted, 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups milk, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 
Directions: 0) Drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach. 1) Beat eggs, onion salt and nutmeg. 2) Add spinach and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; mix well. 3) Combine bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan. 4) Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture. 5) Place in two greased 13-in baking pans. 6) Spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast. 7) Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter. 8) Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. 9) For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt. 10) Stir to form a smooth paste. 11) Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. 12) Add cheese and stir until melted. 13) Saute mushrooms in remaining butter. 14) Stir into cheese mixture. 15) Carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass.
conv_answer: Yes let's start. First drain and squeeze out the excess moisture from spinach.

Directions: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended. 1) Beat in the flour. 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week. 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using. 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) Roll chilled dough thin. 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter. 7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water. 8) Fold round over and press edges together. 9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.

 Context: Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1 cup fruit preserves, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 
Directions: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended. 1) Beat in the flour. 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week. 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using. 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) Roll chilled dough thin. 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter. 7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water. 8) Fold round over and press edges together. 9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.
conv_answer: Good now beat in the flour.
target_answer: 1) Beat in the flour.

Question: How do you start the recipe for a double crust pie? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie, 1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 egg, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 3 ounces cream cheese, 1/4 cup sour cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). 1) Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator. 2) Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust. 3) In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind. 4) Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan. 5) In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream. 6) Beat at medium speed until smooth. 7) Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling. 8) Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar. 9) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown. 10) Cool completely before serving.

Question: What is the first step to getting ready? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 onion, chopped, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained, 5 eggs, beaten, 3 cups shredded Muenster cheese, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch pie pan. 2) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3) Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft. 4) Stir in spinach and continue cooking until excess moisture has evaporated. 5) In a large bowl, combine eggs, cheese, salt and pepper. 6) Add spinach mixture and stir to blend. 7) Scoop into prepared pie pan. 8) Bake in preheated oven until eggs have set, about 30 minutes. 9) Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
conv_answer: First preheat the oven to 175 degrees Celsius. Then lightly grease a 9 inch pie pan.

Directions: 0) In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside. 1) In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice. 2) Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture. 3) Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together. 4) Divide dough into 6 portions. 5) Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan. 6) Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans. 7) Place tart pans on a large baking sheet. 8) Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal. 9) Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil. 10) Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender. 11) Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes. 12) Carefully remove sides of tart pans. 13) Serve warm or cool.

 Context: Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter, softened, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 3 bananas, mashed, 1/4 cup milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup wheat bran, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Grease a muffin pan or line with paper muffin liners. 2) In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy. 3) Add bananas, milk, vanilla and eggs; mix well. 4) Stir in flour, bran, baking powder, soda and salt; blend just until moistened. 5) Stir in walnuts. 6) Pour batter into prepared muffin cups. 7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean. 8) Cool in the cups for 5 minutes, then remove muffins and place on a wire rack to cool completely.

Question: What is next after preparing the skinless, boneless chicken breasts? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
conv_answer: Good, that's it for the ingredients, we can start to cook! First preheat oven to 200 degrees C.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
conv_answer: Sure, take them out and let them cool.
target_answer: 5) Let garlic cool.

Directions: 0) Cut a pocket in each slice of bread. 1) Open carefully 2) In a large bowl, combine the ricotta, cottage cheese and cream cheese. 3) Add the sugar and flavoring extract and beat until smooth. 4) Spread the mixture evenly into each bread pocket. 5) Beat together the egg substitutes and milk. 6) Dip the slices of bread in the egg mixture. 7) Heat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat. 8) Coat with cooking spray. 9) Cook the toast on each side for about 3 to 4 minutes per side until golden brown.

Question: Ok I have done the no_answer> and what is next? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 onions, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, crushed, 1/2 green bell pepper, chopped, 1/2 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 pinch saffron, salt to taste, 2 cubes  chicken bouillon, 1 1/2 cups uncooked white rice, 1 cup beer, 1 (15 ounce) can peas, drained, 1/2 red bell pepper, roasted and sliced, 
Directions: 0) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. 1) Saute chicken until lightly browned; remove from skillet and set aside. 2) Saute onion, garlic and green bell pepper until soft; stir in tomato sauce, saffron, salt and bouillon and return chicken pieces to skillet. 3) Cook for 10 minutes, then add rice and reduce heat to low. 4) Add beer and simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until rice is tender. 5) Finally, stir in peas with liquid and garnish with roasted red bell pepper.
conv_answer: Good, now saute the chicken until it becomes lightly browned. After that you can put it aside.
target_answer: 1) Saute chicken until lightly browned; remove from skillet and set aside.

Question: How do I make Atomic Canuck Chili? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 pounds lean ground beef, 1/2 large onion, diced, 1 tablespoon crushed red pepper, 3 tablespoons garlic powder, 1 tablespoon seasoned pepper, 2 (4 ounce) cans mushroom pieces, drained, 1 (28 ounce) can baked beans, 2 (15.25 ounce) cans kidney beans with liquid, 2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste, 1/4 cup white sugar, 3 carrots, sliced, 3 stalks celery, sliced, 1 green bell pepper, diced, 1 red bell pepper, diced, 2 jalapeno chile peppers, diced, 1/4 cup Canadian beer, 2 tablespoons crushed red pepper, hot sauce, 1/4 cup barbeque sauce, 
Directions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, brown ground beef together with onion, crushed red pepper, garlic powder, and seasoned pepper. 1) Drain off the fat, and place the mixture into a slow cooker. 2) Stir mushrooms, baked beans, kidney beans with liquid, tomato paste, sugar, carrots, celery, peppers, beer, and barbeque sauce into the slow cooker. 3) Season with hot sauce and more crushed red pepper. 4) Cover, and cook on Low for 4 to 5 hours.
conv_answer: Hi. first take a large skillet.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package baby carrots, sliced, 2 medium onions, sliced, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 3 tablespoons butter, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups milk, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 cup fine dry bread crumbs, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil. 2) Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm. 3) Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish. 4) Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese. 5) In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth. 6) Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper. 7) Pour over the carrots, onions, and cheese in the baking dish. 8) Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs. 9) Sprinkle evenly in the baking dish. 10) Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
conv_answer: Good you now can season with salt and pepper and after that simmer it for 1 hour.
target_answer: 7) Season with salt and pepper.

predictions: 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
labels: 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat.

Question: What is the first step to completing the form? 
 Context: Ingredients: 6 eggs, beaten, 2 1/4 cups milk, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 2 teaspoons white sugar, 1 pinch ground nutmeg, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, milk and 1/3 cup sugar. 1) Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture coats a metal spoon. 2) Remove from heat. 3) Cool quickly by placing pan in a sink or bowl of ice water and stirring 1 to 2 minutes. 4) Stir in the vanilla. 5) Chill 4 to 24 hours. 6) Before serving, whip the cream and 2 tablespoons sugar until soft peaks form. 7) Transfer chilled egg mixture to a punch bowl. 8) Sprinkle each serving with nutmeg. 9) Fold in whipped cream mixture and serve at once.

Question: How should I start the condensed beef and mushroom soup? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 pounds ground beef, 17 saltine crackers, finely crushed, 1/2 cup milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 pinch salt, or to taste, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup, 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended. 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper. 3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan. 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight. 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef. 7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well. 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter). 9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once. 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish. 12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix. 13) Pour over the meat in the dish. 14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil. 15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.
conv_answer: You should take a large bowl and mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.
target_answer: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.

 Context: Ingredients: 3 pounds ground beef, 17 saltine crackers, finely crushed, 1/2 cup milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 pinch salt, or to taste, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup, 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended. 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper. 3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan. 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight. 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef. 7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well. 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter). 9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once. 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish. 12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix. 13) Pour over the meat in the dish. 14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil. 15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.
conv_answer: Now line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper and press the beef mixture firmly into the pan.
target_answer: 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper.

predictions: 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight.
labels: 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight.

Question: Can we start to prepare the recipe? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 teaspoons peanut oil, 2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger root, 1/4 cup chopped lemon grass, 2 teaspoons crushed red pepper, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips, 1 onion, thinly sliced, 2 cups bok choy, shredded, 4 cups water, 1 (10 ounce) can coconut milk, 1/4 cup fish sauce, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat peanut oil. 1) Stir in garlic, ginger, lemon grass, red pepper, coriander and cumin and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. 2) Stir in chicken and onion and cook, stirring, until chicken is white and onion is translucent, 5 minutes. 3) Stir in bok choy and cook until it begins to wilt, 5 to 10 minutes. 4) Stir in water, coconut milk, fish sauce and cilantro. 5) Simmer until chicken is thoroughly cooked and flavors are well blended, 30 minutes.

Question: Nice. How do I start? 
 Context: Ingredients: 8 medium beets, 1 pound unsalted butter, 1 1/2 cups minced Vidalia onions, 4 Bosc pears - peeled, cored and minced, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/2 cup cranberry vinegar, 1 teaspoon salt, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Wash beets, and place in a roasting pan. 2) Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until tender. Set aside to cool. 3) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 4) Stir in onion, pears, sugar, and vinegar; cook, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes. 5) When the beets are cool enough to handle, peel and coursely chop. 6) Puree onion mixture in a food processor with metal blade. 7) Add salt and 1/2 of the beets; pulse 4 to 5 times. 8) Add remaining beets, and pulse 2 to 3 times.
conv_answer: First preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 200 degrees Celsius.

Question: What is the first step when I am ready? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1/4 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 2 ounces butter, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1 egg, 2 egg yolks, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Butter one Madeleine pan. 2) Sift the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt together. 3) Cream the butter with the vanilla and the sugar. 4) Add the egg and egg yolks, beating to mix. 5) Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined only, do not over mix. 6) Place rounded teaspoon of batter into the prepared Madeleine shell forms. 7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes. 8) Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool. 9) Once cool sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, if desired.
conv_answer: First you can already preheat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius and butter one Madeleine pan.

Question: Ok sounds good. I have all the ingredients ready. Can we start? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/4 cup butter, melted, 1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
conv_answer: Sure! You can preheat the oven to 175 degrees C.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
conv_answer: We can start to make the filling!
target_answer: 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted.

predictions: 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth.
